testcase.name: Verify user logs in to the SauceDemo application
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed When user enters the credentials............................................passed And user click on the Login button..........................................passed Then user lands on the homescreen...........................................passed

testcase.name: Verify User login fails with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed When user enters invalid credentials........................................passed And user click on the Login button..........................................passed Then user should remain on the login page...................................passed And an error message should be displayed....................................passed
